service: serverless-app

plugins:
 - serverless-offline

provider:
 name: aws
 runtime: nodejs18.x
 profile: alvaro

functions:
  GetFilmsOldSwapiFunction:
    name: GetFilmsOldSwapiFunction
    handler: dist/main.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: /old-swapi/films
          method: get
